name: Generous Aid Receivers
title: Top Beneficiaries of Belgian Aid
description: In 2017, the Maldives received a significant net bilateral aid flow from Belgium, amounting to -200,000 USD, highlighting its reliance on international support.

name: Clean Air Champions
title: Lowest PM2.5 Air Pollution Exposure
description: In 2015, only a minuscule percentage of the Maldivian population was exposed to PM2.5 air pollution levels exceeding WHO guidelines, making it one of the cleanest air environments globally.

name: Human Resource Heroes
title: High CPIA Human Resource Rating
description: The Maldives achieved a CPIA building human resources rating of 5 in 2023, indicating strong development in human capital and resource management.

name: Youthful Mothers
title: Low Teenage Motherhood Rate
description: In 2017, only 1.6% of Maldivian women aged 15-19 were teenage mothers, reflecting effective youth education and health policies.
